config_description: Replica factor is determined via the replication strategy used by the specified keyspace.
developer_understanding_on_working: The configuration code checks if initial tokens are specified, if not, it checks for allocationKeyspace. If neither are specified, it chooses num_tokens tokens at random. If initial tokens are specified, it uses those tokens. If allocationKeyspace is specified, it uses the token allocation algorithm to generate suitable tokens.
developer_understanding_on_triggering_fr: The triggering frequency of the configuration 'allocate_tokens_for_keyspace' depends on the conditions specified in the code. It can be triggered when initial tokens are specified, when allocationKeyspace is specified, or when num_tokens is less than 1.
developer_understanding_on_size_impact: The impact of the 'allocate_tokens_for_keyspace' configuration option is significant as it determines the token allocation for the specified keyspace. It affects the distribution of data across the nodes in the cluster and can impact the performance and scalability of the system.
